:py:mod:`pyslam.common_capture`
===============================

.. py:module:: pyslam.common_capture

.. autoapi-nested-parse::

   This submodule contains utilities related to
   common kinds of capture sources and measurements
   that our framework can use out of the box.

----------

   :titlesonly:
   :maxdepth: 1

   UncalibratedMonocularCamera/index.rst
